titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BASE DEFICIT CONCENTRATION (WORST WITHIN 12 HOURS AFTER BIRTH) - Description

div.p: BASE DEFICIT CONCENTRATION (WORST WITHIN 12 HOURS AFTER BIRTH) is the worst deficit result of any Clinical Investigation which measures the PERSON's base excess concentration, where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Millimoles per litre (mmol/L)', taken within twelve hours of the PERSON BIRTH DATE (BABY).
